item.title: 国泰君安抨击摩根大通最大 ETF，随后又出尔反尔
item.description: 一开始，金融顾问们的收件箱里充斥着这样的推销信息。只不过这一次，道富投资管理公司（State Street Investment Management）用它来抨击摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：It began as the kind of sales pitch that floods the inboxes of financial advisers. Except this time, State Street Investment Management used it to take a swipe at one of JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s showcase ETFs, a head-turning move that cut through the industry’s usual politeness.】

item.title: 欧佩克+国家再次面临能抽多少油的棘手问题
item.description: 本周末，欧佩克+国家再次聚首一堂，共同探讨他们实际能够泵出多少石油这一棘手问题。【原文：OPEC+ nations gathering this weekend are once again grappling with the thorny question of how much oil they’re physically able to pump.】

item.title: 美国生产者价格指数增长 0.3%，能源价格上涨带动增长
item.description: 美国 9 月份的批发通胀率较上月有所上升，反映出能源和食品成本的上涨。【原文：US wholesale inflation picked up in September from a month earlier, reflecting higher energy and food costs.】

item.title: 美国 9 月零售销售因消费者退缩而失去动力
item.description: 美国 9 月份的零售额小幅增长，表明一些消费者在经历了几个月的强劲消费后暂停了消费。【原文：US retail sales rose modestly in September, suggesting some consumers hit pause after several months of robust spending.】

item.title: 报道称乌克兰可能达成和平协议，铜价跳涨
item.description: 伦敦铜价升至每吨 11,000 美元，有报道称乌克兰已同意美国斡旋的和平协议条款，这在供应趋紧的情况下提振了市场情绪。【原文：Copper rose towards $11,000 a ton in London, with a report that Ukraine has agreed to terms for a US-brokered peace deal bolstering sentiment at a time of tightening supply.】

item.title: 风力发电量下降导致欧洲短期电价飙升
item.description: 由于风力发电量急剧下降，又恰逢寒流来袭，欧洲短期电力价格飙升，德国是该地区最紧张的市场。【原文：European short-term power prices spiked, with Germany the tightest market in the region, as a sharp drop in wind generation coincided with a cold snap.】

item.title: 里夫斯计划减免股票税以促进伦敦上市
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将在周三的预算案中宣布对伦敦证券交易所的新上市公司实行为期三年的印花税免税期，政府将加大力度重振萎靡不振的市场。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will announce a three-year stamp duty holiday for new listings on the London Stock Exchange in her budget on Wednesday, as the government ramps up efforts to revive the ailing market.】

item.title: 尼日利亚意外维持利率不变以抑制物价压力
item.description: 尽管人们预期非洲最大的石油生产国尼日利亚的通胀将继续降温，但尼日利亚央行出人意料地保持利率稳定。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank unexpectedly held interest rates steady, despite expectations that inflation will continue to cool in Africa’s largest oil producer.】

item.title: 波兰将于 2026 年初提出数字服务税计划
item.description: 波兰正在起草对在线平台征税的法律，以寻求为本地企业创造公平的竞争环境，因为在这个东欧国家，外国竞争对手不需要缴纳税款。【原文：Poland is drafting legislation to tax online platforms, seeking to level the playing field for local firms whose foreign competitors aren’t subject to levies in the east European country.】

item.title: 随着市场兴趣减退，美国房屋销售商将陈旧房源撤出市场
item.description: 随着美国房地产业的停滞不前，美国的房屋销售商正在将房源撤出市场。【原文：Homesellers in the US are yanking listings off the market, as the nation’s real estate sector stagnates.】

item.title: 中间市场企业摇摆不定，私人债务违约率将攀升
item.description: 据克罗尔债券评级机构（Kroll Bond Rating Agency）称，由于越来越多的中型市场公司面临压力，明年1.7万亿美元私人信贷市场的违约率将上升。【原文：Defaults are poised to rise across the $1.7 trillion private credit market next year as a growing number of middle-market firms are experiencing stress, according to Kroll Bond Rating Agency.】

item.title: 美国 Altice 将提前两年偿还 19 亿美元杠杆贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Altice USA Inc.计划提前两年多偿还19亿美元的定期贷款，对于这家负债累累的电信公司来说，这一举措出乎意料，令贷款人感到吃惊。【原文：Altice USA Inc. plans to pay off a $1.9 billion term loan more than two years early, an unexpected step for the highly indebted telecommunications firm that surprised lenders, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油流量继续下滑，价格也再次回落
item.description:
自美国宣布最新制裁以来，出货量每天减少 53 万桶

。【原文：

Shipments fell by 530,000 barrels a day since latest US sanctions were announced

】

item.title: 亚马逊、Shein 逼近之际，MercadoLibre 试图吸引巴西的网上购物者
item.description: 长期以来，MercadoLibre 公司一直主导着拉丁美洲的在线购物市场，但在这个假日季节，它发现自己正在与来自太平洋两端的竞争对手展开一场较量。【原文：MercadoLibre Inc. has long dominated the online-shopping market in Latin America, but this holiday season, it finds itself in a fight to fend off rivals from both ends of the Pacific Ocean.】

item.title: 哈罗德-哈姆的阿根廷赌约是米莱的里程碑
item.description: 这位压裂先驱进军巴塔哥尼亚页岩，可能会为其他公司打开大门。【原文：The fracking pioneer’s push into Patagonian shale may open doors for others.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员在最后期限临近之际游说对立银行制定规则计划
item.description: 几位欧洲顶级央行行长就如何减轻贷款机构的监管负担提出了相互竞争的建议，他们试图在一份报告定稿前几周影响讨论，该报告将为欧盟层面的决策奠定基础。【原文：Several top European central bankers made competing proposals on how to reduce the regulatory burden on lenders as they seek to influence the discussion just weeks before finalizing a report that will set the stage for decisions at the European Union level.】

item.title: 中国顶尖企业将人工智能代理视为下一个战场
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）从香港为您报道中国最大的人工智能公司的当务之急。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov checks in from Hong Kong with a look at what’s top of mind for China’s biggest AI companies.】

item.title: 特朗普关于美国将获得 21 万亿美元投资的说法对吗？
item.description: 白宫列出了近 9.6 万亿美元的新投资承诺，少于特朗普吹嘘的数额。【原文：The White House lists nearly $9.6 trillion in new investment pledges, less than what’s boasted by Trump.】

item.title: 特朗普的牛肉价格战满足了美国永不满足的需求
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统正在开展一场降低牛肉价格的运动。但是，美国对蛋白质的强大需求使这一目标难以实现。【原文：President Donald Trump is on a campaign to bring down beef prices. But the nation’s powerful demand for protein is making that goal difficult.】

item.title: 贝莱德希望在新一轮交易热潮中将沙特投资翻番
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的目标是在未来几年内迅速扩大其在沙特阿拉伯和更广泛的中东地区的投资，因为该公司希望利用从基础设施到人工智能等领域的蓬勃发展。【原文：BlackRock Inc. aims to rapidly grow its investments in Saudi Arabia and the wider Middle East in the next few years as it looks to tap into a rush of activity in areas from infrastructure to artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 诺和诺德称新一代糖尿病注射液使体重减轻 14.5%
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）称，在一项研究中，一种下一代糖尿病注射剂降低了患者的血糖，并帮助他们减轻了体重，这可能是这家陷入困境的制药商未来产品组合的一个积极信号。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S said a next-generation diabetes shot lowered patients’ blood sugar and helped them lose weight in a study that may be a positive sign for the embattled drugmaker’s future portfolio.】

item.title: 十年前的谷歌芯片挑战英伟达
item.description:
TPU可能是打破 Nvidia 在人工智能计算能力市场上的垄断地位的秘诀

TPUs could hold the secret to breaking Nvidia’s stranglehold on the market for AI computing power

】

item.title: 人工智能狂热的三年：ChatGPT 如何重整股市秩序
item.description: 三年前，OpenAI 发布了 ChatGPT，在华尔街掀起了一股人工智能狂潮。从那以后，股市就一蹶不振。【原文：Three years ago, OpenAI released ChatGPT, setting off a mania on Wall Street for all things artificial intelligence. And the stock market hasn’t been the same since.】

item.title: 美国数据将显示通胀回归的风险导致国债下滑
item.description: 美国数据预计将显示通胀压力反弹，这将削弱对美联储降息的猜测，在此之前，国债下滑。【原文：Treasuries slipped ahead of US data expected to show a rebound in inflation pressures, which would dent speculation over Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 乌克兰再次袭击俄罗斯黑海石油基础设施
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普称其和平建议取得进展之际，乌克兰本月第三次袭击了俄罗斯在黑海的关键能源基础设施。【原文：Ukraine attacked key Russian key energy infrastructure on the Black Sea for a third time this month just as President Donald Trump cited progress on his peace proposal.】

item.title: 在人工智能和全球扩张之后，马云支持的蚂蚁金服利润增长 10
item.description: 中国数字支付巨头蚂蚁金服集团公司通过人工智能模型、仿人机器人和医疗保健增强了其人工智能能力，该公司的季度利润增长了 10%。【原文：Ant Group Co.’s quarterly profit grew 10% after the Chinese digital payments giant bolstered its artificial intelligence capacity via AI models, humanoid robots and health care.】

item.title: 巴西初级矿工联合起来推动关键矿产议程
item.description: 在巴西开发关键矿产项目的初级矿业公司正联合起来，为他们的共同利益而努力，因为巴西正努力成为战略资源争夺战的主要参与者。【原文：Junior mining companies developing critical minerals projects in Brazil are banding together to advocate for their shared interests as the country seeks to be a key participant in the race for the strategic resources.】

item.title: 智利质疑刺激养老基金回报的掉期交易
item.description: 智利的养老基金已经迷上了利率衍生品来增加收益，其名义头寸已经膨胀到 5000 多亿美元，比三年前增加了 100 倍。【原文：Chile’s pension funds have become hooked on interest-rate derivatives to juice returns, with their notional positions ballooning to more than $500 billion, a 100-fold increase from just three years ago.】

item.title: 受人工智能和云计算增长推动，阿里巴巴营收超预期
item.description: 乘着中国人工智能发展的东风，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）公布的季度收入增长好于预期。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue growth, riding China’s AI development boom.】

item.title: Alphabet 反弹威胁全球最有价值股票排名
item.description: 有迹象表明，这家搜索巨头正在努力与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Alphabet Inc. shares are poised to shake up the ranking of the world’s most valuable companies, amid signs the search giant is making headway in efforts to rival Nvidia Corp.’s bestselling AI accelerator.】
